p: The inorganic ingredients of indigo naturalis was consist of 70% calcium carbonate, 10% silica dioxide and calcium hydroxide [ 3, 11]. In addition, it may also include Fe 2(CO 3) 3, Al 2 (CO 3) 3, etc [ 11]. Calcium carbonate and calcium hydroxide are derived from lime, and silica dioxide and other impurities are derived from soil.
